title: You have been disconnected. Please check your internet connection.
body:
I've been getting this error every time i try playing a game, worked for a bit then started giving me the error again, and its starting to really bother me.
I've uninstalled and re-installed, did the speed test thing, and currently scanning my laptop. 
Does anyone have a sulition? And riot, please fix this ASAP, i've seen people get this error from 2 years ago.

replies.body: I've been having the same problem. I've had 3 teams have to remake because of me now and I'm really afraid of getting banned if it keeps happening

If this is happening during the loading screen (after champ select), then your network might be having problems specifically connecting to the game server.  I suggest going over each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tighten up your connection and resolve this.  Let me know if you have any questions!
